sentence.Network_en: The royalties enabled the inventor to re-establish himself in business.
sentence.Network_cn: 专利使用费让这位发明家得以再次立足于商界。

sentence.Network_en: He became famous as an inventor of astonishing visual and aural effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因发明了神奇的视听效果而出名。

sentence.Network_en: In my youth my ambition had been to be an inventor.
sentence.Network_cn: 我年轻时的抱负是成为一个发明家。

means.word_mean: 发明人,作者,发现者,创建者

encyclopedia.content: 概述 Inventor美国AutoDesk公司推出的一款三维可视化实体模拟软件Autodesk Inventor? Professional（AIP），目前已推出最新版本AIP2013。同时还推出了iphone版本，在app store有售。Autodesk Inventor Professional包括Autodesk Inventor®三维设计软件；基于AutoCAD平台开发的二维机械制图和详图软件AutoCAD Mechanical；还加入了用于缆线和束线设计、管道设计及PCB IDF文件输入的专业功能模块，并加入了由业界领先的ANSY

entry.def: An inventor is a person who has invented something, or whose job is to invent things.

example.ex: ...Alexander Graham Bell, the inventor of the telephone.
example.tran: 亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔,电话的发明者

means.word_mean: 1. someone who is the first to think of or make something

auth_sentence.content: His father Isaac was a part-time ironworker and inventor.
auth_sentence.res_content: His father Isaac was a part-time ironworker and inventor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His father Isaac was a part-time ironworker and inventor.

auth_sentence.content: Price called the inventor simply some unknown ingenious mechanic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Price called the inventor simply some unknown ingenious mechanic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Price called the inventor simply some unknown ingenious mechanic.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的
stems_affixes.word_buile: event[n.事件,事情]+ful充满……的→事件多→多变故的
event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
vent风+ilate=ate表动词→v.使通风;给…装通风设备

Sentence.sentence: He becomes an inventor and sells his inventions in order to attend the university.

sentences.en: Edison won his spurs as an inventor while rather young.
sentences.cn: 爱迪生很年轻的时候就获得了发明家的声誉。
